import React from "react"; import Hero from "../components/Hero"; /* quick helper to make a bullet row */ const Bullet = ({ children }) => (
  • 🐾 {children}
    • ); function Home() { return (
    {/* ABOUT */}

    Our Story

    Bela's Paw's was started by two brothers who began fostering rescue dogs during the lockdown. With support from the PFA (People for Animals) network, they fostered and cared for 25–30 dogs rescued across Pune — including a weak Doberman who had been used for breeding. With proper food, medication, and love, she recovered and inspired them to build a safe, loving home-stay for all pets.

      Open play areas + optional cozy crates Daily photo/video updates for pet parents Home-cooked food (Chicken & Rice) — customizable Green surroundings with beautiful hills near Hinjawadi
    {/* SERVICES */}

    Our Services

    Simple, transparent care options. Pricing shared on request.

    {[ { t: "Daycare (12 hr)", d: "Perfect for workdays. Play, rest & updates." }, { t: "Boarding (24 hr)", d: "Overnight care with comfy sleeping areas." }, { t: "Long Stay", d: "Weekly / Monthly packages with routines." }, { t: "Food & Care", d: "Chicken & Rice; diets customized as needed." }, ].map((c) => (

    {c.t}

    {c.d}

    ))}

    📌 Pricing available on request.

    {/* GALLERY */}

    Gallery

    A peek into our green, open play areas and happy guests.

    {[ "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596495578065-8a3f94d17f54?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1548199973-03cce0bbc87b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1543466835-00a7907e9de1?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500530855697-b586d89ba3ee?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1546182990-dffeafbe841d?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568572933382-74d440642117?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80", ].map((src, i) => ( ))}
    {/* REVIEWS */}

    What Pet Parents Say

    Real feedback from our Google profile (trimmed for brevity).

    {/* Abhishek Fating */}

    Abhishek Fating: Excellent pet stay. Both Madhav and his brother are very good. They helped us do trial sessions before the actual stay and kept sending updates & photos which gave us confidence. It was an excellent transition for Bella. BIG THANK YOU!

    {/* Tanmay Tikekar */}

    Tanmay Tikekar: Great homestay! We kept Charlie for 7 days — they took care of him like their own kid: playtime, exercise, proper feeding time, and regular photos/videos. He enjoyed the stay.

    {/* Naina Gill */}

    Naina Gill: Very good experience. Our rescued dogs started eating home-cooked food there and also got training tips. Highly recommend.

    {/* Yatharth Srivastava */}

    Yatharth Srivastava: Completely satisfied with the way Sagar and Madhav took care of Simba. He was comfortable at the place and with the routine.

    {/* Sharath S */}

    Sharath S: We were hesitant initially but Sagar ensured a secure environment and kept Robert busy. We received regular updates and he came back happy. We now trust Bela's Paw's blindly when we go out.

    {/* Saket Joshi */}

    Saket Joshi: Kind owners, hygienic place. Proof of vaccination required. Free trials available and flexible timing. Regular WhatsApp updates kept us assured about Coco's safety.

    {/* CONTACT */}

    Contact Us

    We're near Hinjawadi Hills (Xrbia) Main Gate, Pune — surrounded by greenery and mountain views.

    • 📍 View on Google Maps
    • 📞 +91 8189054507  |  +91 9131546670
    • 📷 Instagram (DMs open)
    {/* Simple inquiry form (no backend) */}
    e.preventDefault()} aria-label="Inquiry form" >
